scripts.lint: npm run lint-js; npm run lint-css
scripts.dev: npm run install; npm run link; npm run build
scripts.install: for name in irma-core irma-css irma-frontend plugins/irma-client plugins/irma-console plugins/irma-dummy plugins/irma-popup plugins/irma-web; do npm run install-dir --dir=$name; done
scripts.link: for name in irma-core irma-css plugins/irma-client plugins/irma-web plugins/irma-popup; do npm run link-src --dir=$name; done; npm run link-dest --dir=plugins/irma-popup; npm run link-dest --dir=irma-frontend
scripts.build: for name in irma-css irma-frontend; do npm run build-dir --dir=$name; done
